name: Integration Gmail, OpenAI (ChatGPT, Sora, DALL-E, Whisper), Google Sheets

parameters.name: markSeen
parameters.label: Mark email message(s) as read when fetched

messages.content:
You are an expert analyst.

Summarize the given text into exactly 3 bullet points.

Return the result strictly in JSON format like this:
{
  "summary1": "...",
  "summary2": "...",
  "summary3": "..."
}

Do not add any extra text.
â€‹
